title: Privacy Overview
content: Hello, and welcome to the Privacy Overview module. When it comes to patient information it is especially important that we understand the regulations and guidelines so we can protect patient privacy.
Explain the need for standardization in the secure chip industry. Describe how GlobalPlatform provides solutions to facilitate secure chip acceptance.
list: Build a root of trust using a GlobalPlatform device.
Choose the best management model according to your ecosystem.
